instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.R6905: What is R6905? Resistor between charger voltage and input to PP3V42_G3H power supply on older Macbooks, pre-2011 models. This resistor blows when C6990 has shorted to ground or U6990 has shorted to ground, and will result in PP3V42_G3H missing and the magsafe charger not having a light since PP3V42_G3H is necessary for the SMC to turn on and the onewire circuit to turn on..
definitions.U8900: What is U8900? This chip creates the GPU power rails on the 820-3332 board to the 2012 and early 2013 15‚Äù Retina Macbook Pros. It becomes desoldered and is the cause of no video and kernel panics/crashes in that model most of the time..

threads.title: 820 3332 runs off charger but not battery
threads.message:
820 3332 runs off charger but not battery. Greenlight on MagSafe

PP3V42  3.396v
PPBUS G3H 12.68v running on MagSafe
PPBUS G3H 10.78v running on batt
PPBUS G3H 10.93v running on MagSafe and batt
PPVBATT G3 CONN 10.76v
SMC BC ACOK 3.25v
CHGR ACIN 4.80v
PP18V5 DCIN CONN R 20.15v
PPBUS G3H R 12.67v running on MagSafe
PPVIN G3H P3V42G3H 19.93v

<RESISTOR>R6905</RESISTOR> 9.9ohm
<RESISTOR>R6920</RESISTOR> 47.5ohm

threads.title: 820 3332 runs off charger but not battery
threads.message: Is the battery recognized in the OS?

threads.title: 820 3332 runs off charger but not battery
threads.message: Yes, and gives charging lighting bolt when connected to magsafe

threads.title: 820 3332 runs off charger but not battery
threads.message: 12.68 volts on PPBUS seems a little high. Any history on this liquid random drop etc?

threads.title: 820 3332 runs off charger but not battery
threads.message: No liquid as far as I can tell, dont know of any drops, no major damage on casing

threads.title: 820 3332 runs off charger but not battery
threads.message: Does it shut off immediately when AC disconnected? If yes then check if 3V42 is present on only battery.

threads.title: 820 3332 runs off charger but not battery
threads.message: 3v42 is 3.39v with battery only. I should have mentioned that this is in internment issuse, but when it is occurring, yes, the machine shuts right down when magsafe is disconnected.

threads.title: 820 3332 runs off charger but not battery
threads.message: Intermittent.....right, have you done the common <CHIP>U8900</CHIP> reflow?

threads.title: 820 3332 runs off charger but not battery
threads.message: Not on this machine, did not know <CHIP>U8900</CHIP> could cause a thud type of issuse, but i will definitely give it a shot.
